text: Ewane ku hevriyan digirin hene! Di nezik da (ewan aha) dibejin: "Heke Yezdan biva, me u bav u kale me ji hevri ne digirtin u qe me tu tist ji ne durist nedikir." Bi vi awayi, ewane di berya wan da ji (ku pexemberen xwe) dane derewderandine (weki wan gotine). Heya ku tirs u sapata me (ji wan ra hatiye) ewan cesna sapata me kirine. Tu (ji wan ra aha) beje: "Gelo li bal we (ji wan biryaran) zanineke we heye, ku hun ewe zanine idi ji bona me ra derxin (bidne nisane me)? Bi rasti hey hun dibine peyrewe gomanan u hun hey derewan ji ber xwe aloze dikin
